document.full_text: a turkish police officer was shot dead by unidentified assailants on wednesday in the northern turkish city of kastamonu, where prime minister tayyip erdogan had been speaking earlier in the day, cnn turk tv said.
document.title: police officer shot in turkey after pm visit: tv
lines_and_colors: a turkish police officer was shot dead by unidentified assailants on wednesday in the northern turkish city of kastamonu, where prime minister tayyip erdogan had been speaking earlier in the day, cnn turk tv said.
